patthana17.6:4.1: Kusalaṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.6:4.4: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana17.6:5.1: Kusalaṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.6:5.4: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana17.6:6.1: Kusalaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana17.6:6.4: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
